I forgot to mention this - bring a swimsuit, and plenty of money.

I had the feeling that I knew what Haruhi was going to say.
That was a strong, straight pitch, thrown a little high and inside.
Perhaps he feels like he is got nothing left to lose.
No, not quite.
Perhaps he feels like he is got nothing left to lose.
Perhaps he feels like he is got nothing left to lose.

Perhaps he feels like he is got nothing left to lose.
It felt like this exact same conversation had happened before.
We do not know that yet.
He winds up for the second pitch... it felt like this exact same conversation had happened before.
It felt like this exact same conversation had happened before.
I guess it is what you would call deja vu.
It is a hit!
And it is a big one!
It is headed for left field...
I guess it is what you would call deja vu.
And it is good!
It is a solo home run!
And with this, Jyonan's gotten their eighth run!
You are late, Kyon!
Show some more motivation!
Yeah, yeah.
Sorry I made you wait.
I just got here, too.
Okay, we are all here, so let us go.
Where are we going?
To the public swimming pool, of course!
Well, I guess that makes sense.
We have to do summer vacation-y things during our summer vacation!
We can never get back the time that we have lost!
And so we are going to do them now, during this,
our one and only summer as tenth graders!
By the way, we are going to the pool by bike.
Did you ride your bikes too?
No, the only two bikes we have are yours and mine.
Okay, are you ready?
Of course not!
I am!
Kyon, you would better not lose to Koizumi.
This train is leaving the station!
Dammit!

Everything's a new experience, what about it?
Endless Eight
Kyon, we are about to go have fun.
This is no time to be exhausted.
You are such a slacker.
Whose fault do you think this is?
Oh, the scent of chlorine.
This really makes it feel like a pool!
Come on, time to go swimming!
Let us race!
No diving
It is dangerous
No diving
It is dangerous Cannot you read this sign?
Cannot you read this sign?
Hurry up and get in!
The water's warm so it feels fine!
That looks like fun.
This makes me smile, though.
Miss Suzumiya has some rather normal ways
of enjoying her time, do not you think?
Miss Suzumiya, laughing and having a good time like that,
is not likely to shake up the world, after all.
I hope that is the case...
What is wrong?
Koizumi!
It is nothing...
It is probably just my imagination.
Because so much has happened since the beginning of spring,
I have become a little paranoid.
Come on, let us go swim.
Hey!
Hey now!
Take that!
Get back here!
I think it would be better to call this a communal pool than a public pool.
This feeling...
It feels like I have seen this scene once before.
Where Nagato kind of looks like she is bored... and then...
Kyon!
Right, and then Haruhi shows up and says this...
These two are my brigade members.
They will do anything you ask, so ask for anything you want!
Okay, let us have some fun!
We are going to play water soccer.
Come on!
Well, deja vu is not all that uncommon.
Here I go, Mikuru!
Okay!
I am sorry!
Summer outing, pool, Bon festival, fireworks show, part-time job, stargazing...
Summer outing, pool, Bon festival, fireworks show, part-time job, stargazing...
What is this?
What is this?
I thought about what we will be doing from here on.
It is a schedule of how we will spend
the rest of our short summer vacation.
We only have two weeks of summer vacation left.
And yet it feels like there are a lot of things we have yet to do.
But we have only got this much time left.
That is why we are going to pick up the pace!
Is there anything else you want to do, Mikuru?
Umm... I would like to try goldfish scooping.
Okay!
Goldfish scooping...
Pardon me for a moment.
Thank you.
Is there a place nearby having a Bon festival?
A fireworks show would work, too.
I will check around.
Do not forget about the goldfish scooping!
It is Mikuru's sole request, after all.
Roger that.
Okay, Kyon.
We are starting tomorrow!
Incoming call: Haruhi Suzumiya
The next morning, it was Haruhi that awoke me from my slumber.
They found a place that was holding a Bon festival.
It seems to be happening tonight at a public park.
Both Mikuru and Yuki said that they do not own a yukata.
So we are going to go buy some to wear tonight.
I do not own one either,
and there is a place selling them in sets for cheap!
You are coming too!
Haruhi entered a women's clothing outlet store.
She just went and chose yukata for Miss Asahina and Nagato,
and then headed straight for the changing rooms.
After making us wait about an hour or so...
(That would make anyone yawn.)
The three of them finally came out at once.
Excellent!
You all look wonderful.
Of course!
I chose these yukata, after all.
Especially Mikuru!
It is so cute on you!
Just what you would expect from my choice!
Yes...
Miss Asahina... it is so good, Miss Asahina!
I guess it makes sense for there to be this many people.
Hmm?
There it is again...
This feeling...
It is been a while since I have come to a Bon festival,
but it feels like I went to one recently.
That tower,
those vendors...
This is...
Mikuru!
They have goldfish scooping, just like you wanted!
This way!
Okay!
Shall we play, too?
I will pass.
You are interested in that stuff?
Which one?
I will buy it...
It is all right.
- This one.
- Right-o.
I kind of got the feeling that Nagato had been helping us out,
so I thought buying it for her would be appropriate, but...
Wow, what a haul!
Thirteen!
But I do not need so many, so I just kept one for each of us.
Huh?
What is with the mask, Yuki?
I bought it.
I see.
I need to use your back for a second.
What?
Just turn around!
Hey.
Now then, next up is fireworks!
Let us launch some fireworks to end the day!
Do not you understand the meaning of the word moderation?
It was summer, and summer vacation.
That is why I wanted to forget about it,
but there was one thing lingering in my mind.
Okay, everyone, tomorrow we will be catching bugs!
This will be the SO IS Brigade's Cicada Capturing Competition!
Whoever catches the most bugs
will get to be the brigade leader for one day!
Haruhi, it is fine to want to play around,
but are you finished with your summer homework?
What are you talking about?
You can finish homework like that in just three days.
Take care of all of that bothersome stuff
so you can have fun without having to worry about it.
That is how you enjoy your summer vacation!
Why is she so smart?
The next day was yet again a beautiful day.
It was on this day
that we had the SO IS Brigade Cicada Capturing Competition.
It looks like each of us did try, in their own way,
but of course, or something to that effect,
the winner ended up being Haruhi.
The next day, we met up,
even though we had no idea what was going on.
And we continued to have no idea what was going on,
even as we were made to wear frog costumes,
and pass out balloons in front of a supermarket as our part-time job.
Are you all right?
I thought I was going to die.
Actually, I am going to die.
Thanks for the hard work, especially in this heat.
The manager is thankful.
I do not care about his thanks.
Where is our pay?
This is it.
I have wanted this for a while.
The owner said that he would give it to us for Mikuru's sake.
We worked for that?
Mikuru, you can wear it whenever you want.
You have my permission!
Ribbit.
That night, a single phone call stole me away from my slumber.
Dammit.
Yes?
Whoa!
Kyon...
Is that you, Miss Asahina?
Yes, it is me...
Something... very not good has...
At this rate, I...
Umm...
Umm...
Hello, this is Koizumi.
Hello, this is Koizumi.
Why are you with Miss Asahina?!
Certain circumstances came up.
Would it be possible for you to come join us right now?
Of course!
I will be right there!
What in the world happened, Miss Asahina?
Kyon...
I cannot return to the future!
Cannot return?
Err...
What do you mean, cannot return?
In other words, this is what is going on.
We are going through an eternal loop of the same time period.
What?
We are going through an eternal loop of the same time period.
We are going through an eternal loop...
Koizumi, do you realize what you are saying?
I do.
Much more than I wish I did.
I had just been speaking with Miss Asahina.
Call me too.
And as a result, what we realized was that recently,
the flow of time was a bit strange.
You might want to credit this to Miss Asahina.
Thanks to her, I was able to confirm it.
Confirm what?
That we have experienced the same span of time numerous times.
You said that earlier.
To be precise, we have been repeating the time
from August 17th to the 31 st.
We are in the middle of an endless summer vacation.
Well, we are certainly in the middle.
It is a never-ending endless summer.
This world has lost all time after September 1 st.
That is why Miss Asahina cannot return to the future.
I suppose you could say that it is natural
that she cannot return to a future that does not exist.
Cut it out.
What is natural about something as stupid as that?
Who would believe it?
We would like for you to believe it.
Umm... I will explain, too.
Well... because of classified information,
I am always contacting the future and classified information-ing,
but I had not received any classified information
for about a week or so, and I thought, that is strange.
And so I classified information...
I was so surprised, I tried to classified,
I was so surprised, I tried to classified, Miss Asahina, are your classifieds
but it was completely classified...
Miss Asahina, are your classifieds
but it was completely classified... things that cannot be said on TV?
Things that cannot be said on TV?
Are we trapped inside one of those closed spaces?
That is not it.
A single portion of time has been torn away.
At exactly the point when it becomes midnight on August 31 st,
everything resets, and we go back to August 17th.
That is the process.
So what about our...
No, humanity's memories?
Those are reset as well.
Everything starts over from the beginning.
So you mean that time does that thing that you mentioned.
Well, I guess it cannot be helped.
Oh no, Miss Asahina is not involved in this.
Okay, then, what is?
I would guess Miss Suzumiya.
I am sure she does not realize it, but somewhere inside of her
is a desire to not let summer vacation end.
Do you mean she feels regret over something?
That is what I believe.
Perhaps she feels that there is something left
that she wants to do during our summer vacation?
Man, the hopeless situations she causes unfold on a galactic scale.
I have been wondering this since I got here,
but you seem awfully cheerful about this.
It is because we have finally been able to solve
the recent mysterious and frequent feelings of deja vu that I have had.
Now that I think about it, those inexplicable feelings may have been
remnants from when our memories have been reset.
You have been feeling them too, right?
Is it possible that other people across the world feel this, too?
You and I are a special case.
It appears that the people who are closest to Miss Suzumiya
are able to sense this strangeness.
What about Haruhi?
Does she sense any of this at all?
Not at all, it seems.
It would probably be bad for us if she did.
However, I believe that there is one person who remembers everything,
more than the deja vu that we do.
And who would that be?
I think you know.
Is that right, Nagato?
It is.
You remember all of it?
Yes.
So, how many times have we repeated all of this, this time?
This is the fifteen thousandth, four hundred and ninety-ninth time.
What do you mean by 15,499?
Nagato, what are you saying?
Are you serious?
I am.
You are saying that we have done the exact same things that many times?
They are not all guaranteed to happen.
Out of 15,499 repetitions, there are two occasions,
2,391 and 11,054, where we did not go to a Bon festival.
A pattern where we did go to a Bon festival,
but did not go to a goldfish scooping stand, occurred 437 times.
We have had a part-time job 9,026 times, and when we did,
there are six different kinds of jobs that we did.
In addition to handing out balloons,
we also worked as movers, cashiers, we handed out fliers,
worked as call center...
worked as call center...
I got it, that is enough.
I got it, that is enough.
15,499 times, that is what Nagato said.
Times two weeks, hmm, that is around 594 years.
She alone has memories of all that time,
repeating it all over and over...
Nagato, how must it feel
to experience that same period of time over and over again?
I have heard yet another crazy story.
The next day we went stargazing.
The location was Nagato's apartment,
and the telescope was one that Koizumi had gotten for us.
I am bored of this.
UFOs.
Let us look for UFOs.
Hey!
Stop it, Haruhi, you will break it!
Exactly what does she want to do?
Now what could that be?
If we could figure that out, this would all be solved...
How about trying this out?
Give Miss Suzumiya a sudden embrace from behind,
then whisper I love you into her ear.
And who would be doing that?
Is there anyone else who could fill the role other than you?
Consider me out.
All right, how about if I do it?
I am kidding.
I am lacking a certain something for the role.
And all that would do is because
unnecessary confusion in Miss Suzumiya.
We continued to run through a torrent of summer vacation events.
We went to a batting center,
to a real fireworks show,
and we even took part in a goby fishing tournament.
We also had a test of courage,
watched some movies,
went to the beach, went bowling,
and even to karaoke.
We were always doing something.
Of course, I knew that this was not going to satisfy Haruhi.
Even still, there was not anything I could do about it,
and the last days of our summer vacation ticked away.
And so we ended up at August 30th...
With this, we have finished everything on our list.
Hmm.
I wonder if this was good enough.
But, hmm, well...
I guess this works.
Hey, is there anything else you want to do?
That is fine, then.
We were able to do a lot this summer,
so that is enough, right?
No, Haruhi...
You are still not satisfied.
Okay, we are done for today.
I had tomorrow set aside just in case,
but you can just take the day off.
Let us meet again in the clubroom the day after tomorrow.
Wait, Haruhi.
There it is again!
That deja vu!
And it is a strong one, stronger than ever before.
I cannot let Haruhi leave.
If she goes,
we will end up repeating these past two weeks
for the some-thousandth time again.
But what should I do?
What should I say?
There must have been a hint somewhere in what Haruhi said.
But what was it?
What has she said up to this point?
I do not know...
I cannot remember...
August 31 st. I have not touched my homework.
Whatever, it does not matter anymore.
If we are just going to do it all over again,
then there is no point to doing it.
Whether tomorrow comes or not,
I will leave it to the me at that time to deal with it.
